Package org.rapidcontext.util

Interface BinaryUtil.Hash

Enclosing class:
BinaryUtil
public static interface BinaryUtil.Hash
The currently supported hash algorithms.

  • Field Details

    • MD5

      @Deprecated static final String MD5
      Deprecated.
      Use SHA2 or SHA3 instead.
      The MD5 (128 bit) hash algorithm. Cryptographically broken and unsuitable for further use.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SHA1

      @Deprecated static final String SHA1
      Deprecated.
      Use SHA2 or SHA3 instead.
      The SHA-1 (160 bit) hash algorithm. Unsuitable for security usage (i.e. passwords), but may be used as data checksum.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SHA2

      static final String SHA2
      The SHA-256 (256 bit) hash algorithm.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SHA3

      static final String SHA3
      The SHA3-256 (256 bit) hash algorithm.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values
